Class GeometricProgression

java.lang.Object
learn.geometry.GeometricProgression
public class GeometricProgression extends Object
Represents a geometric progression (GP) of double-precision floating-point numbers.

A geometric progression is a sequence of non-zero numbers where each term after the first is found by multiplying the previous one by a fixed, non-zero number called the common ratio.

Instance Formation Rules:

An instance of this class can be in one of three states:
  • Empty: Created with the no-argument constructor. It has no terms.
  • Uninitialized: Created with one term. The common ratio is not yet known. A second term must be inserted to initialize the progression.
  • Initialized: Created with two terms, or by adding a second term to an uninitialized progression. The common ratio is known, and the sequence can be extended.
Note: A first term of zero is not supported for calculating a common ratio.

Method Overview:

  • Constructors:
    • GeometricProgression(): Creates an empty GP.
    • GeometricProgression(double first_term): Creates a GP with one term (uninitialized).
    • GeometricProgression(double first_term, double second_term): Creates a fully initialized GP.
  • Modification Methods:
    • insertTerm(double n): Inserts a term, initializing the GP if needed or validating against the existing ratio.
    • insertTillNthTerm(int n): Extends the sequence to a total of 'n' terms.
    • safeInsertNextTerm(): Calculates and adds the next term automatically.
    • removeLastTerm(): Removes and returns the last term from the sequence.
    • removeLastNTerms(int n): Removes the last 'n' terms.
    • clearGP(): Empties the sequence, saving the old one to a history heap.
    • updateGP(double n_second_term): Changes the second term and recalculates the entire sequence.
    • resetGP(double n_first_term, double n_second_term): Replaces the sequence with a new one.
  • Calculation and Prediction:
    • predictTerm(): Returns the value of the next term without adding it.
    • predictTerm(int n): Calculates the value of the nth term in the series.
    • sumOfGP(): Returns the sum of all terms currently in the sequence.
    • projectedSumOfGP(int n): Calculates the sum of the first 'n' terms of the series.
  • State and Validation:
    • getCurrentSequence(): Returns a copy of the current sequence.
    • getRemovedHeap(): Returns a history of all cleared sequences.
    • clearRemovedHeap(): Clears the history of removed sequences.
    • getGPCurrentValidityTestResult(): Returns a map with the current state (empty, initialized, valid).
    • isValidGP(ArrayList<Double> sequence): A static method to check if any list of doubles is a valid GP.

  • Method Summary
